**The Young Painter**  
Lily frowned at her canvas. The guitar in her still-life looked flat. "Try foreshortening the neck," suggested her teacher. draw_prompt: A surreal digital painting of an elongated asphalt road with white dashed lines converging to a vanishing point, featuring a dramatically foreshortened human hand reaching towards the horizon. The foreground hand appears gigantic while the distant horizon hand appears tiny, rendered in warm tones with high-contrast lighting to emphasize perspective compression.
